## Plugin\_2.registerHoverLinkSource() method

Register your view with the 'Page preview' core plugin as an emitter of the 'hover-link' on the event.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerHoverLinkSource(id: string, info: HoverLinkSource): void;
```
